item.description: Drop-in, informal group averaging 10 or so people each week.  You are welcome to just show up or call for more information.  We watch an ongoing series of DVDs -- Eckhart Tolle speaking during retreats and intensives in recent years. For more information you can visit Eckhart Tolle Evening at Sacred Spaces http://sacredspaces.ws/gpage2.html or call me at 508-624-7519. Usually 8 to 20 people each week (after finding us on Meetup, people don't usually register here each week, so you can't judge by those numbers).  I look forward to meeting you in stillness.   Peace, Judy
item.name: Eckhart Tolle Thursday Evenings at Sacred Spaces Meetup
